vfsCore

Class CoreImportExport

  • java.lang.Object
    • vfsCore.CoreImportExport

  • public class CoreImportExport
extends java.lang.Object
    The CoreImportExport is an intermediate class between the generality of the Core class and the specificity of the CoreIO class. It provides a bridge between those two classes, specialized in the import and export of files and folders.
    Author:
    simon

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private CoreIO cio
      the CoreIO instance associated with this CoreImportExport
      private Compressor compressor 
      private boolean isCompressionEnabled
      attributes for the compression.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CoreImportExport(CoreIO cio)
      Constructor, using a CoreIO parameter
      CoreImportExport(CoreIO cio, boolean compression) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean exportFile(File file, java.lang.String destination)
      exports a File (vfsCore.File) to the host system, with the name destination (in the next version, this will allow to specify any path)
      boolean exportFolder(Folder folder, java.lang.String destination)
      exports a folder from the VFS disk, and its files and subfolders, on the host file system.
      File importFile(java.io.File fileToAdd, java.lang.String name)
      imports a file(java.io.File) to the root of the VFS disk, and give it the specified name
      Folder importFolder(java.io.File folderToAdd, java.lang.String name)
      imports a folder, and its files and sub-folders to the root of the VFS disk, preserving the hierarchy

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • importFile

        public File importFile(java.io.File fileToAdd,
              java.lang.String name)
                throws java.io.IOException,
                       java.io.FileNotFoundException
        imports a file(java.io.File) to the root of the VFS disk, and give it the specified name
        Parameters:
        fileToAdd - the File to import
        name - the name of this file on the VFS
        Returns:
        the VFS File corresponding to the imported file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • importFolder

        public Folder importFolder(java.io.File folderToAdd,
                  java.lang.String name)
                    throws java.io.IOException,
                           java.io.FileNotFoundException
        imports a folder, and its files and sub-folders to the root of the VFS disk, preserving the hierarchy
        Parameters:
        folderToAdd - a java.io.File element corresponding to the folder
        name - the name of the folder on the VFS disk
        Returns:
        a Folder (subclass of Hierarchy) corresponding to the imported folder
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • exportFile

        public boolean exportFile(File file,
                 java.lang.String destination)
        exports a File (vfsCore.File) to the host system, with the name destination (in the next version, this will allow to specify any path)
        Parameters:
        file - the file to export
        destination - the name of the file once exported
        Returns:
        true if the operation is successful

      • exportFolder

        public boolean exportFolder(Folder folder,
                   java.lang.String destination)
        exports a folder from the VFS disk, and its files and subfolders, on the host file system. The hierarchy is conserved
        Parameters:
        folder - the hierarchy Folder to export
        destination - the name on the folder in the host file system
